dc_title_s: Map of the states of Ohio, Indiana and Illinois with the settled part of Michigan; engraved by J. H. Young.; Title on cover: Mitchell's map of Ohio, Indiana, Illinois & Michigan MiU
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures. Prime meridian: Washington. "Sold by Mitchell & Hinman." Insets: Vicinity of Detroit -- Vicinity of Cincinnati -- Falls of Ohio -- Lead region east of the Mississippi River. Includes table of steamboat routes. 1 map: hand col.; 42 x 54 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Young, J. H. (James Hamilton),Mitchell, S. Augustus (Samuel Augustus), 1792-1868.,Mitchell & Hinman.
